headline: LVS Stock Down 23%—Stifel Sees Buy Opportunity Amid Macau Recovery Hopes
summary: Las Vegas Sands Corp. (NYSE:LVS) is one of billionaire Leon Cooperman’s top stock picks with huge upside potential. With a price target of $57, Stifel analysts reiterated their Buy rating on Las Vegas Sands Corp. (NYSE:LVS) on June 5. The decision comes after the firm hosted Alistair Scobie, the Investor Relations representative for LVS, at the […]
